sources.name: Bradshaw and Mayhew (2011) - Extreme income poverty in Europe
sources.description:
Data published by Bradshaw, J., & Mayhew, E. (2011). The measurement of extreme poverty in the European Union.
Data publisher's source EU SILC 2008
Link http://ec.europa.eu/social/BlobServlet?docId=6462&langId=en
Retrieved 2017-02-16

Estimates correspond to individuals living in households with per capita disposable income below the corresponding poverty line.
